recipe.name: Rice-A-Roni Artichoke Salad
recipe.notes: Rice-a-Roni tends not to be the the healthiest thing in the pantry.  It probably could be replaced with an equivalent or similar rice preparation: rice prepared with chicken stock, saffron rice, etc.Needs research:  Allegedly this recipe works with chicken as well,b ut hard to say if that's in additon to or in as a replacement for the rice.
recipe.preparation: Combine rice, onions, artichoke hearts, celery and curry powder.  Mix mayonnaise with oil from one jar of artichoke hearts and pour over rice mixture.  Chill.
recipe.source_name: "World Ag Expo Favorites", Kathleen Aguiar contributor
